description: Try our easy to follow Chicken with Sweet Barbecue Marinade recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ chicken,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chicken with Sweet Barbecue Marinade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine tomato sauce, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, oil and paprika in a shallow dish.
Open out chicken thigh fillets so they are flat. Add to marinade and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour or overnight.
When ready to cook, drain excess marinade from chicken. Cook on the chargrill for 1520 minutes or until cooked through and golden.
